Magister Berkh:
Balance and harmony are the most important things in life.
My name is Berkh. I'm guarding the pass from the Ivory Tower to Hellbound.
We are looking for brave heroes who can stop Beleth planning to conquer all the continent.
You can teleport to Hellbound from the Ivory Tower on Saturdays from 10:00 till 24:00.
But keep in mind that only characters of Lv. 85 or higher can be transferred to Hellbound.
